file: tmp_【3D LIVE】みんなありがとう！ぺこーらありがとうLIVE！【ホロライブ⧸兎田ぺこら】 [L2y7a_zMi20]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Happy Present' by Usada Pekora and Hakui Koyori.
Performance of the song 'Hana no Tou' by Usada Pekora and Shirakami Fubuki.

subtitles.original: ハッピー・プレゼント
subtitles.english: Happy Present

subtitles.original: 健気に頑張る
subtitles.english: Working hard with all my heart

subtitles.original: いつの日か
subtitles.english: That one day...

subtitles.original: 振り向かせてみせるわ
subtitles.english: I'll make you turn around and look at me!

subtitles.original: 鈍感すぎなのよ　御身さん
subtitles.english: You're just too dense, you!

subtitles.original: Happy Happy Happy Present
subtitles.english: Happy Happy Happy Present

subtitles.original: あなたにHappy Present
subtitles.english: A Happy Present for you

subtitles.original: わかってほしいの　この気持ち
subtitles.english: I want you to understand these feelings

subtitles.original: あなただけよ　永遠のワンス
subtitles.english: It's only you, my eternal "once"

subtitles.original: Happy Happy Happy Present
subtitles.english: Happy Happy Happy Present

subtitles.original: あなたに全部捧げる I love you
subtitles.english: I'll give you everything, I love you

subtitles.original: いつか終わるの？
subtitles.english: Will it end someday?

subtitles.original: ねぇ　抱きしめてほしい
subtitles.english: Hey, I want you to hold me

subtitles.original: 片想い
subtitles.english: Unrequited love

subtitles.original: まとめて　ため息色
subtitles.english: All together, the color of a sigh

subtitles.original: 不意に見つめる先に
subtitles.english: Suddenly, where you're looking...

subtitles.original: 暗い横顔　ミステリアス
subtitles.english: ...your dark profile is mysterious

subtitles.original: 走る渡り廊下
subtitles.english: Running through the connecting corridor

subtitles.original: 背中押す　全力モード
subtitles.english: Pushing your back, in full-power mode

subtitles.original: もしかして　振られたの？
subtitles.english: Could it be that you got dumped?

subtitles.original: 元気出してよ
subtitles.english: Cheer up!

subtitles.original: 私がいるよ
subtitles.english: I'm here for you!

subtitles.original: 告白だよ　でも気づいてない顔
subtitles.english: It's a confession, but you're not noticing

subtitles.original: 鈍感すぎよ　御身さん
subtitles.english: You're just too dense, you!

subtitles.original: ときめきHappy Present
subtitles.english: Heart-throbbing Happy Present

subtitles.original: ドキドキもっとPresent
subtitles.english: More heart-pounding Presents

subtitles.original: 気づいてほしいの　胸の鼓動
subtitles.english: I want you to notice my heartbeat

subtitles.original: 奏でてるよ　恋のメロディ
subtitles.english: It's playing a melody of love

subtitles.original: ときめきHappy Present
subtitles.english: Heart-throbbing Happy Present

subtitles.original: あなたに全部捧げる I want you
subtitles.english: I'll give you everything, I want you

subtitles.original: いつになるだろう？
subtitles.english: When will it be?

subtitles.original: ねぇ　終わらせたいよ
subtitles.english: Hey, I want to end it

subtitles.original: 片想い
subtitles.english: Unrequited love

subtitles.original: 花の塔
subtitles.english: Tower of Flower

subtitles.original: 君が持ってきた漫画
subtitles.english: The manga you brought over

subtitles.original: くれた知らない名前のお花
subtitles.english: The flower with the name I didn't know that you gave me

subtitles.original: 今日はまだ来ないかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if you won't come today either

subtitles.original: 初めての感情知ってしまった
subtitles.english: I've come to know a feeling for the first time

subtitles.original: 窓に飾った絵画をなぞって
subtitles.english: Tracing the painting decorated on the window

subtitles.original: 一人で宇宙を旅して
subtitles.english: Traveling through space all by myself

subtitles.original: それだけでいいはずだったのに
subtitles.english: That should have been enough, and yet...

subtitles.original: 君の手を握ってしまったら
subtitles.english: If I were to end up holding your hand

subtitles.original: 孤独を知らないこの街には
subtitles.english: In this town that doesn't know loneliness...

subtitles.original: もう二度と帰ってくることはできないのでしょう
subtitles.english: ...I probably won't be able to return ever again

subtitles.original: 君が手を差し伸べた
subtitles.english: You reached out your hand

subtitles.original: 光で影が生まれる
subtitles.english: Shadows are born from the light

subtitles.original: 歌って聴かせて
subtitles.english: Sing it for me

subtitles.original: この話の続き
subtitles.english: The rest of this story

subtitles.original: 連れて行って見たことない星まで
subtitles.english: Take me away, to a star I've never seen before

subtitles.original: 誰の手の声も届かない
subtitles.english: Where no one's hands or voices can reach

subtitles.original: 高くそびえ立った塔の上
subtitles.english: Atop the tower that stands tall

subtitles.original: 飛ばす風船　風連れ
subtitles.english: Letting balloons fly, carried by the wind
